title: Observation of eight-photon entanglement
abstract: The creation of increasingly large multipartite entangled states is not only a fundamental scientific endeavour in itself, but is also the enabling technology for quantum information. Tremendous experimental effort has been devoted to generating multiparticle entanglement with a growing number of qubits. So far, up to six spatially separated single photons have been entangled based on parametric downconversion. Multiple degrees of freedom of a single photon have been exploited to generate forms of hyper-entangled states. Here, using new ultra-bright sources of entangled photon pairs, an eight-photon interferometer and post-selection detection, we demonstrate for the first time the creation of an eight-photon Schrödinger cat state with genuine multipartite entanglement. The ability to control eight individual photons represents a step towards optical quantum computation, and will enable new experiments on, for example, quantum simulation, topological error correction and testing entanglement dynamics under decoherence.

title: Microfluidic directional emission control of an azimuthally polarized radial fibre laser
title_cn: 方位偏振径向光纤激光器的微流定向发射控制
abstract: Lasers with cylindrically symmetric polarization states are predominantly based on whispering-gallery modes, characterized by high angular momentum and dominated by azimuthal emission. Here, a zero-angular-momentum laser with purely radial emission is demonstrated. An axially invariant, cylindrical photonic-bandgap fibre cavity filled with a microfluidic gain medium plug is axially pumped, resulting in a unique radiating field pattern characterized by cylindrical symmetry and a fixed polarization pointed in the azimuthal direction. Encircling the fibre core is an array of electrically contacted and independently addressable liquid-crystal microchannels embedded in the fibre cladding. These channels modulate the polarized wavefront emanating from the fibre core, leading to a laser with a dynamically controlled intensity distribution spanning the full azimuthal angular range. This new capability, implemented monolithically within a single fibre, presents opportunities ranging from flexible multidirectional displays to minimally invasive directed light delivery systems for medical applications.
abstract_cn: 具有圆柱对称极化状态的激光主要基于耳语画廊模式，其特征是高角动量并以方位角发射为主。在此，展示了具有纯粹径向发射的零角动量激光器。轴向泵送一个充满了微流体增益介质塞的轴向不变的圆柱形光子带隙光纤腔，从而产生独特的辐射场方向图，其特征是圆柱对称性和指向方位角的固定偏振。围绕光纤芯的是嵌入光纤包层中的电接触且可独立寻址的液晶微通道的阵列。这些通道调制从光纤纤芯发出的偏振波前，导致激光器具有动态控制的强度分布，该强度分布跨越整个方位角范围。这项新功能在单根光纤中实现，带来了从灵活的多向显示器到医疗应用的微创定向光传输系统等各种机会。

title: Heralded quantum entanglement between two crystals
title_cn: 预示着两个晶体之间的量子纠缠
abstract: Quantum networks must have the crucial ability to entangle quantum nodes. A prominent example is the quantum repeater, which allows the distance barrier of direct transmission of single photons to be overcome, provided remote quantum memories can be entangled in a heralded fashion. Here, we report the observation of heralded entanglement between two ensembles of rare-earth ions doped into separate crystals. A heralded single photon is sent through a 50/50 beamsplitter, creating a single-photon entangled state delocalized between two spatial modes. The quantum state of each mode is subsequently mapped onto a crystal, leading to an entangled state consisting of a single collective excitation delocalized between two crystals. This entanglement is revealed by mapping it back to optical modes and by estimating the concurrence of the retrieved light state. Our results highlight the potential of crystals doped with rare-earth ions for entangled quantum nodes and bring quantum networks based on solid-state resources one step closer.
abstract_cn: 量子网络必须具有纠缠量子节点的关键能力。一个著名的例子是量子中继器，它可以克服单个光子直接传输的距离障碍，前提是可以以先驱的方式纠缠远程量子存储器。在这里，我们报告观察到掺杂到单独晶体中的两个稀土离子的成簇纠缠。经过预言的单光子通过50/50分束器发送，从而在两个空间模式之间散布了一个单光子纠缠态。每个模式的量子态随后被映射到晶体上，从而导致纠缠态，该纠缠态由在两个晶体之间散布的单个集体激发组成。通过将其映射回光学模式并估计所获取的光状态的并发性，可以揭示这种纠缠。我们的研究结果凸显了掺有稀土离子的晶体在纠缠的量子节点中的潜力，并使基于固态资源的量子网络更近了一步。

title: Cascaded single-photon emission from the Mollow triplet sidebands of a quantum dot
title_cn: 量子点的莫洛三重态边带的级联单光子发射
abstract: Emission from a resonantly excited quantum emitter is a fascinating research topic within the field of quantum optics and is a useful source for different types of quantum light fields. The resonance spectrum consists of a single spectral line that develops into a triplet above saturation of the quantum emitter. The three closely spaced photon channels from the resonance fluorescence have different photon statistical signatures. We present a detailed photon statistics analysis of the resonance fluorescence emission triplet from a solid-state-based artificial atom, that is, a semiconductor quantum dot. The photon correlation measurements demonstrate both ‘single’ and ‘cascaded’ photon emission from the Mollow triplet sidebands. The bright and narrow sideband emission (5.9 × 106 photons per second into the first lens) can be conveniently frequency-tuned by laser detuning over 15 times its linewidth (Δv ≈ 1.0 GHz). These unique properties make the Mollow triplet sideband emission a valuable light source for quantum light spectroscopy and quantum information applications, for example.

title: Frequency comb generation at terahertz frequencies by coherent phonon excitation in silicon
title_cn: 硅中相干声子激发在太赫兹频率下产生频率梳
abstract: High-order nonlinear light–matter interactions in gases enable the generation of X-ray and attosecond light pulses, metrology and spectroscopy. Optical nonlinearities in solid-state materials are particularly interesting for combining optical and electronic functions for high-bandwidth information processing. Third-order nonlinear optical processes in silicon have been used to process optical signals with bandwidths greater than 1 GHz (ref. ). However, fundamental physical processes for a silicon-based optical modulator in the terahertz bandwidth range have not yet been explored. Here, we demonstrate ultrafast phononic modulation of the optical index of silicon by irradiation with intense few-cycle femtosecond pulses. The anisotropic reflectivity modulation by the resonant Raman susceptibility at the fundamental frequency of the longitudinal optical phonon of silicon (15.6 THz) generates a frequency comb up to seventh order. All-optical >100 THz frequency comb generation is realized by harnessing the coherent atomic motion of the silicon crystalline lattice at its highest mechanical frequency.
abstract_cn: 气体中的高阶非线性光与物质的相互作用使得能够产生X射线和阿秒光脉冲，计量学和光谱学。固态材料中的光学非线性对于将光学功能和电子功能结合在一起以进行高带宽信息处理特别感兴趣。硅中的三阶非线性光学过程已被用于处理带宽大于1＆＃160; GHz（ref。＆＃160;）的光信号。但是，尚未探索太赫兹带宽范围内基于硅的光调制器的基本物理过程。在这里，我们演示了通过强烈的几个周期飞秒脉冲的辐照对硅的光学指数进行的超快声子调制。在硅的纵向光子的基本频率（15.6＆＃160; THz）下，由共振拉曼磁化率引起的各向异性反射率调制产生高达七阶的频率梳。全光＆gt; 100＆＃160; THz频率梳的产生是通过利用硅晶格在其最高机械频率下的相干原子运动来实现的。

title: Ultralow-power all-optical RAM based on nanocavities
title_cn: 基于纳米腔的超低功耗全光RAM
abstract: Optical random-access memory (o-RAM) has been regarded as one of the most difficult challenges in terms of replacing its various functionalities in electronic circuitry with their photonic counterparts. Nevertheless, it constitutes a key device in optical routing and processing. Here, we demonstrate that photonic crystal nanocavities with an ultrasmall buried heterostructure design can solve most of the problems encountered in previous o-RAMs. By taking advantage of the strong confinement of photons and carriers and allowing heat to escape efficiently, we have realized all-optical RAMs with a power consumption of only 30 nW, which is more than 300 times lower than the previous record, and have achieved continuous operation. We have also demonstrated their feasibility in multibit integration. This paves the way for constructing a low-power large-scale o-RAM system that can handle high-bit-rate optical signals.
abstract_cn: 在用电子光子替代其在电子电路中的各种功能方面，光学随机存取存储器（o-RAM）被认为是最困难的挑战之一。 尽管如此，它还是光路由和处理中的关键设备。 在这里，我们证明了具有超小型掩埋异质结构设计的光子晶体纳米腔可以解决以前的o-RAM中遇到的大多数问题。 通过充分利用光子和载流子的严格限制并允许热量有效散逸，我们实现了功耗仅为30nW的全光RAM，比以前的记录低300倍以上；并且 实现了连续运行。 我们还展示了它们在多位集成中的可行性。 这为构建可处理高比特率光信号的低功耗大规模o-RAM系统铺平了道路。</ p>

title: Organic light-emitting diodes employing efficient reverse intersystem crossing for triplet-to-singlet state conversion
title_cn: 利用高效反向系统间交叉进行三重态到单态转换的有机发光二极管
abstract: Light emission from organic light-emitting diodes that make use of fluorescent materials have an internal quantum efficiency that is typically limited to no more than 25% due to the creation of non-radiative triplet excited states. Here, we report the use of electron-donating and electron-accepting molecules that allow a very high reverse intersystem crossing of 86.5% between non-radiative triplet and radiative singlet excited states and thus a means of achieving enhanced electroluminescence. Organic light-emitting diodes made using m-MTDATA as the donor material and 3TPYMB as the acceptor material demonstrate that external quantum efficiencies as high as 5.4% can be achieved, and we believe that the approach will offer even higher values in the future as a result of careful material selection.
abstract_cn: 由于使用了非辐射三重态激发态，使用荧光材料的有机发光二极管发出的光的内部量子效率通常限制为不超过25％。 在这里，我们报告了给电子和受电子分子的使用，它们允许非辐射三重态和辐射单重态激发态之间有非常高的反向系统间穿越，达到86.5％，从而实现增强的电致发光。 使用m-MTDATA作为施主材料并使用3TPYMB作为受主材料制成的有机发光二极管表明，可以实现高达5.4％的外部量子效率，并且我们相信该方法将来将提供更高的价值。 精心选择材料的结果。

title: A comparison of graphene, superconductors and metals as conductors for metamaterials and plasmonics
title_cn: 石墨烯，超导体和金属作为超材料和等离子体的导体的比较
abstract: Recent advancements in metamaterials and plasmonics have promised a number of exciting applications, in particular at terahertz and optical frequencies. Unfortunately, the noble metals used in these photonic structures are not particularly good conductors at high frequencies, resulting in significant dissipative loss. Here, we address the question of what is a good conductor for metamaterials and plasmonics. For resonant metamaterials, we develop a figure-of-merit for conductors that allows for a straightforward classification of conducting materials according to the resulting dissipative loss in the metamaterial. Application of our method predicts that graphene and high-Tc superconductors are not viable alternatives for metals in metamaterials. We also provide an overview of a number of transition metals, alkali metals and transparent conducting oxides. For plasmonic systems, we predict that graphene and high-Tc superconductors cannot outperform gold as a platform for surface plasmon polaritons, because graphene has a smaller propagation length-to-wavelength ratio.
abstract_cn: 超材料和等离激元的最新进展已承诺了许多令人兴奋的应用，特别是在太赫兹和光学频率上。不幸的是，在这些光子结构中使用的贵金属在高频下并不是特别好的导体，导致显着的耗散损耗。在这里，我们要解决的问题是什么是超材料和等离激元的良导体。对于共振超材料，我们开发了导体的品质因数，从而可以根据超材料中产生的耗散损耗对导电材料进行直接分类。我们方法的应用预测石墨烯和高T c 超导体不是超材料中金属的可行替代品。我们还概述了许多过渡金属，碱金属和透明导电氧化物。对于等离激元系统，我们预测石墨烯和高T c 超导体不能胜过作为表面等离激元极化子的平台的金，因为石墨烯的传播长度与波长之比较小。
